title: What's the difference between level on here?
body: Huh I'm so confused about this

replies.body: The level of your board's profile is directly linked to your Summoner level in the client! For instance, when you first start playing league, your summoner level and boards level are both 1. As you level your Summoner up in the client, your board's profile will level up at the same time.

Level, like account level from the XP you get after the game? That lets you use more runes to give you an edge at the beginning of the game, and allows you to use mastery points that give slightly more unique bonuses. Every level lets you use one more mastery point and one more rune.
